version_description:
- Added Lvl. 6 Ultimate Ghost Fleet: defeat Lvl. 5 Ultimate Boss for the Fleet to appear. The Ghost Fleet can jump and recover HP. Please take this challenge seriously;
- Added weekend Guild General Mobilization Event;
- Fixed bugs

- Strengthened Resistence Weakened Effect attributes. When attributes get higher, the resulting effect becomes even greater；
- Added Mystery Auction to the Guild General Mobilization Event. Spend points to win items;
- Added new equipment to craft. Requires Forge ship to reach Lv. 21;
- Significantly increased Fort Storage capacity;
- Changed part of event page for ease of use;
- Fixed bugs
